summary: This document is a letter from Joann Brown, a Mortgage Loan Originator, to Brian Vickers regarding a mortgage loan application. It requests Vickers to review the enclosed documents related to the application and offers assistance with any questions he may have.

persons.name: Brian Vickers
persons.context: Brian Vickers is the recipient of the letter regarding his mortgage loan application.

persons.name: Joann Brown
persons.context: Joann Brown is the sender of the letter, responsible for assisting with the mortgage loan application process.

connections.description: Joann Brown is assisting Brian Vickers with his mortgage loan application.

locations: 435 S Tryon St Unit 700, Charlotte, NC 28202
keyFacts: The document is a letter dated December 4, 2014.
Joann Brown is identified as a Mortgage Loan Originator.
Brian Vickers is the applicant for the mortgage loan.
The letter requests Vickers to review enclosed documents related to his mortgage application.
The document mentions Fifth Third Mortgage Company as the lender.
